DOC.brief_summary: The aim pilot study evaluate effect one regular fast day per week total period 8 week compare normal-eating habit among healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Monday Fasting Day - Non-Randomized Trial Intermittent Fasting
DOC.detailed_description: Participants intervention group receive initial group train fast . Then participant observe one fixed fast day per week ( monday ) total period eight week . Participants control group receive initial group train healthy diet accord current German guideline ( DGE ) . Moreover , receive offer intervention group end 8-week study period . Until control group participant follow regular healthy diet .
DOC.criteria: age 18 65 yr write informed consent severe chronic comorbidity eat disorder pregnancy plan pregnancy simultaneous participation trial
DOC.keyword: Focus observe effect fast healthy volunteer .
